Participants are randomly paired to soak

with content like "What do you think about
love?"  to both discuss and soak for
three minutes at first it was difficult to focus on

the water
but then we closed our eyes and
just focused on how we both felt from
there Every  It was so easy it was
great. Seven couples continued to
date, of which three are still together.
Our goal is to continue to create
more meaningful spaces for
people to connect.
ice baths have become popular
among athletes, who believe that
cold water helps reduce muscle pain and
speed up recovery.
